title: Thror's Map (1R318)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert 2 Hobbits and discard Thror's Map to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).
Lore:	Bilbo still keeps a map of Erebor, the Lonely Mountain, as a memento of his journey with the Dwarves many years ago.
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
